name: study1-fs
title: Dataset for DataTools4Heart project clinical study 1
description: Dataset for DataTools4Heart project clinical study 1

entity.name: pid
entity.description: A unique identifier assigned to each patient in the cohort.

entity.name: encounterId
entity.description: A unique identifier for each hospital encounter.

sampling.description: Use the end time of encounters as the reference time point

feature.name: gender
feature.description: Gender of the patient

feature.name: age
feature.description: Age of the patient at admission date

feature.name: encounterClass
feature.description: Type of encounter (emergency, impatient, outpatient, etc)

feature.name: admissionYear
feature.description: Year of admission to hospital

feature.name: lengthOfStay
feature.description: The total number of days the patient has been hospitalized

feature.name: admissionDate
feature.description: Date of hospital admission

feature.name: dischargeDate
feature.description: Date of hospital discharge

pivot.name: codes
pivot.description: Vital signs collected within 6 months before referenceTimePoint (discharge date)

feature.name: value
feature.description: Value of the vital sign

pivot.name: codes
pivot.description: Vital signs collected within 1 year before referenceTimePoint (discharge date)

feature.name: value
feature.description: Value of the vital sign

pivot.name: codes
pivot.description: Vital signs collected in an encounter

feature.name: value
feature.description: Value of the vital sign

pivot.name: codes
pivot.description: Important lab results to be evaluated features

values.name: ferritin
values.description: Ferritin [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma (mcg/L (or ng/mL: the same))

values.name: tfs
values.description: Iron saturation [Mass Fraction] in Serum or Plasma (%)

values.name: ntProBnp
values.description: Natriuretic peptide.B prohormone N-Terminal [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma (pg/mL)

values.name: bnp
values.description: Natriuretic peptide B [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma (pg/mL)

values.name: crpHs
values.description: C reactive protein [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma (mg/L)

values.name: crpNonHs
values.description: C reactive protein [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by High sensitivity method (mg/L)

values.name: tropIHs
values.description: Troponin I.cardiac [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by High sensitivity method (ng/mL)

values.name: tropInHs
values.description: Troponin I.cardiac [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma (ng/mL)

values.name: tropTHs
values.description: Troponin T.cardiac [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by High sensitivity method (mcg/L)

values.name: tropTnHs
values.description: Troponin T.cardiac [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma (ng/L)

values.name: hdl
values.description: Cholesterol in HDL [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma (mmol/L)

values.name: ldl
values.description: Cholesterol in LDL [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma (mmol/L)

values.name: eGFR
values.description: Glomerular filtration rate/1.73 sq M.predicted [Volume Rate/Area] in Serum, Plasma or Blood (ml/min/1.73m2)

values.name: bun
values.description: Urea nitrogen [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma (mmol/L)

feature.name: value
feature.description: Value of the lab result

pivot.name: code
pivot.description: Symptoms to be evaluated as features

feature.name: display
feature.description: Whether the symptom was present from 24 hours before admission through discharge

feature.name: lvef
feature.description: LVEF (Left ventricular ejection fraction, LOINC 8806-2 (%)) values measured from 6 months before admission through discharge

feature.name: ecg_qrs_duration
feature.description: QRS wave (LOINC: 8633-0 (ms)) duration values measured from 1 months before admission through discharge

feature.name: ecg_qrs_axis
feature.description: QRS wave axis (LOINC: 8632-2 (deg)) values measured from 1 months before admission through discharge

feature.name: ecg_qt_duration_corrected
feature.description: QT wave corrected: (DT4H: bazett (ms)) duration values measured from 1 months before admission through discharge

feature.name: ecg_st
feature.description: ST-elevation: (SNOMED CT 164931005) value (true/false) observed from 1 months before admission through discharge

feature.name: ecg_ischemia_without_st
feature.description: Ischemia without st-elevation: (SNOMED CT 52674009) value (true/false) observed from 1 months before admission through discharge

feature.name: ecg_type_of_rhythm
feature.description: Type of rhythm (LOINC 76281-5) value from 1 months before admission through discharge

feature.name: smoker
feature.description: Determines if the patient is currently smoking. A patient is considered a current smoker if their last recorded smoking status is one of the following: 'Current every day smoker,' 'Current some day smoker,' 'Smoker, current status unknown,' 'Current heavy tobacco smoker,' or 'Current light tobacco smoker' and either has no recorded end date or the end date is after the reference time point. If the last recorded status is 'Former smoker' and it has an end date before the reference time point, the patient is considered a current smoker. If the status is 'Unknown if ever smoked,' the result is empty; otherwise, the patient is considered a non-smoker.

value.path: iif((code = '449868002' or code = '428041000124106' or code = '77176002' or code = '230063004' or code = '230060001') and (endTime.exists().not() or endTime > %referenceTimePoint),true,iif(code = '8517006' and endTime.exists() and endTime < %referenceTimePoint,true,iif(code = '266927001',{},false)))

feature.name: formerSmoker
feature.description: Whether the patient smoked within 1 year prior to the admission end.The patient is considered to have smoked if their most recent smoking status is 'Current every day smoker,' 'Current some day smoker,' 'Smoker, current status unknown,' 'Current heavy tobacco smoker,' or 'Current light tobacco smoker' and either: 1. The recorded start date is within 365 days of the reference time point, 2. There is no recorded end date, or 3. The recorded end date is within 365 days of the reference time point. If the last recorded status is 'Former smoker,' the patient is considered to have smoked in the past year if either the smoking start date is within 365 days of the reference time point or the smoking end date is before the reference time point. If the status is 'Unknown if ever smoked,' the result is empty; otherwise, the patient is considered a non-smoker.

value.path: iif(code = '449868002' or code = '428041000124106' or code = '77176002' or code = '230063004' or code = '230060001',iif(utl:getPeriod(startTime, %referenceTimePoint, 'days').toInteger() <= 365 or endTime.exists().not() or utl:getPeriod(endTime, %referenceTimePoint, 'days').toInteger() <= 365,true, false),iif(code = '8517006' and ((startTime.exists() and utl:getPeriod(startTime, %referenceTimePoint, 'days').toInteger() < 365) or (endTime.exists() and endTime < %referenceTimePoint)), true,iif(code = '266927001',{},false)))

feature.name: totalSmokingDuration
feature.description: Total duration of smoking in days.

feature.name: startTime
feature.description: Total number of smoking periods.

feature.name: nyha
feature.description: New York Heart Association category from 6 months before admission through discharge

feature.name: categorizedValue
feature.description: Severity of hyperkalemia: LOINC 2823-3

feature.name: categorizedValue
feature.description: Severity of chronic kidney disease: LOINC 69405-9

filter.name: heartFailure
filter.filter: icd10Codes.select($this.startsWith('I50') or $this.startsWith('I11.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.2') or $this.startsWith('I26.0') or $this.startsWith('I09.81') or $this.startsWith('I97.13')).anyTrue()

feature.name: timeFromEarliest
feature.description: Time elapsed (in months) since heart failure is observed for the first time until the reference time point

feature.name: ap
feature.description: Whether the patient has angina pectoris within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

feature.name: af
feature.description: Whether the patient has atrial fibrillation within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

feature.name: cm
feature.description: Whether the patient has cardiomyopathy within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

feature.name: dysl
feature.description: Whether the patient has dyslipidemia within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

feature.name: hf
feature.description: Whether the patient has heart failure within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

value.path: icd10Codes.select($this.startsWith('I50') or $this.startsWith('I11.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.2') or $this.startsWith('I26.0') or $this.startsWith('I09.81') or $this.startsWith('I97.13')).anyTrue()

feature.name: hyp
feature.description: Whether the patient has hypertension within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

value.path: icd10Codes.select($this.startsWith('I10') or $this.startsWith('I11.0') or $this.startsWith('I12') or $this.startsWith('I13') or $this.startsWith('I15') or $this.startsWith('I16')).anyTrue()

feature.name: ihd
feature.description: Whether the patient has ischemic heart disease within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

value.path: icd10Codes.select($this.startsWith('I20') or $this.startsWith('I21') or $this.startsWith('I22') or $this.startsWith('I23') or $this.startsWith('I24') or $this.startsWith('I25')).anyTrue()

feature.name: mi
feature.description: Whether the patient has myocardial infarction within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

feature.name: pad
feature.description: Whether the patient has peripheral artery disease within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

value.path: icd10Codes.select($this.startsWith('I73') or $this.startsWith('I70') or $this.startsWith('I71') or $this.startsWith('I72') or $this.startsWith('I74') or $this.startsWith('I75') or $this.startsWith('I77') or $this.startsWith('I78') or $this.startsWith('I79')).anyTrue()

feature.name: stroke
feature.description: Whether the patient has stroke within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

feature.name: tia
feature.description: Whether the patient has transient ischemic attack within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

feature.name: vd
feature.description: Whether the patient has valvular disease within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

feature.name: HF_Disease
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of heart failure after the discharge

feature.name: number_of_days_to_rehosp_for_heart_failure
feature.description: Number of days from discharge until rehospitalization due to heart failure

value.path: iif(primaryReasonCodes.select($this.startsWith('I50') or $this.startsWith('I11.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.2') or $this.startsWith('I26.0')).anyTrue(), utl:getPeriod(%referenceTimePoint, date, 'days') )

feature.name: CV_Disease
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of any cardiovascular condition after the discharge

feature.name: number_of_days_to_rehosp_for_CV
feature.description: Number of days from discharge until rehospitalization due to CV disease

value.path: iif(primaryReasonCodes.select($this.startsWith('I') or $this.startsWith('G45') or $this.startsWith('J81') or $this.startsWith('K76.1') or $this.startsWith('R57')).anyTrue(), utl:getPeriod(%referenceTimePoint, date, 'days') )

feature.name: non_CV_Disease
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of any non-cardiovascular condition after the discharge

feature.name: number_of_days_to_rehosp_for_non_CV
feature.description: Number of days from discharge until rehospitalization due to non-CV disease

value.path: iif(primaryReasonCodes.select($this.startsWith('I') or $this.startsWith('G45') or $this.startsWith('J81') or $this.startsWith('K76.1') or $this.startsWith('R57')).anyFalse(), utl:getPeriod(%referenceTimePoint, date, 'days') )

feature.name: renal_complications
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of any renal complication after the discharge

feature.name: number_of_days_to_rehosp_for_renal_complications
feature.description: Number of days from discharge until rehospitalization due to renal complications

feature.name: isCV
feature.description: Whether the patient dies because of any cardiovascular condition after the discharge

feature.name: number_of_days_to_death_for_CV
feature.description: Number of days from discharge until death due to CV disease

value.path: iif(causesOfDeath.select($this.startsWith('I') or $this.startsWith('G45') or $this.startsWith('J81') or $this.startsWith('K76.1') or $this.startsWith('R57')).anyTrue(), utl:getPeriod(%referenceTimePoint, time, 'days') )

feature.name: isRenal
feature.description: Whether the patient dies because of any renal complication after the discharge

feature.name: number_of_days_to_death_for_renal
feature.description: Number of days from discharge until death due to renal complications

feature.name: isNonRenalAndNonCV
feature.description: Whether the patient dies because of any non-cardiovascular and non-renal condition after the discharge

value.path: iif(causesOfDeath.exists(), causesOfDeath.select($this.startsWith('R99')).allFalse() and causesOfDeath.select($this.startsWith('N18') or $this.startsWith('N19')).allFalse() and causesOfDeath.select($this.startsWith('I') or $this.startsWith('G45') or $this.startsWith('J81') or $this.startsWith('K76.1') or $this.startsWith('R57')).allFalse() )

feature.name: number_of_days_to_death_for_non_renal_and_non_CV
feature.description: Number of days from discharge until death due to non-CV and non-renal complications

value.path: iif(causesOfDeath.select($this.startsWith('R99')).allFalse() and causesOfDeath.select($this.startsWith('N18') or $this.startsWith('N19')).allFalse() and causesOfDeath.select($this.startsWith('I') or $this.startsWith('G45') or $this.startsWith('J81') or $this.startsWith('K76.1') or $this.startsWith('R57')).allFalse(), utl:getPeriod(%referenceTimePoint, time, 'days') )

feature.name: isAllCause
feature.description: Whether the patient dies because of unspecified condition after the discharge

feature.name: number_of_days_to_death_for_all_cause
feature.description: Number of days from discharge until death due to unspecified condition
